monospace-font-name='Meslo LG S for Powerline 10'
show-battery-percentage=false
toolkit-accessibility=false
tweaks./org/gnome/desktop/peripherals/:
[keyboard]
numlock-state=true

[mouse]
left-handed=false
natural-scroll=false
speed=-0.56934306569343063

[stylus/c804d0e]
button-action='default'
pressure-curve=[0, 0, 100, 100]
secondary-button-action='default'
tertiary-button-action='default'

[stylus/default-2d1f:0374]
button-action='default'
pressure-curve=[0, 25, 75, 100]
secondary-button-action='default'
tertiary-button-action='default'

[stylus/default-2d1f:0376]
button-action='default'
pressure-curve=[0, 0, 100, 100]
secondary-button-action='default'
tertiary-button-action='default'

[tablets/056a:0374]
mapping='absolute'
output=['AOC', 'Q2770', 'FSUE8HA009437']

[tablets/056a:0377]
keep-aspect=false
mapping='absolute'
output=['AOC', 'Q32G1WG4', '0x00000eef']

[tablets/2d1f:0374]
keep-aspect=true
mapping='relative'
output=['AOC', 'Q2770', 'FSUE8HA009437']

[tablets/2d1f:0376]
keep-aspect=true
mapping='absolute'
output=['AOC', 'Q32G1WG4', '0x00000eef']

[touchpad]
speed=-0.11032028469750887
two-finger-scrolling-enabled=true
tweaks./org/gnome/mutter/:
[/]
center-new-windows=true
dynamic-workspaces=false
edge-tiling=false
overlay-key='Super_L'
workspaces-only-on-primary=false

[keybindings]
toggle-tiled-left=['<Super>Left']
toggle-tiled-right=['<Super>Right']

[wayland/keybindings]
restore-shortcuts=@as []
